column5: Guys I'm looking at replacing my boat fuel tank lines and was wondering where I can get bulk hose at a good price. Anyone have a recommendation?  Thanks!
CarQuest and NAPA both have what you need by the foot.
Too add,any plumbing/hyd hose supplier will have what you need.
Thanks guys I'll do some calling and let you know who has a good price
I assume you've already checked Hose Headquarters?
Make sure it ethanol compatible.Diesels don't need it. So there is alot of fuel line out their that isn't.
Not yet will give them a call this week
